summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein. It includes an attorney requesting to attend a briefing in place of a client who will be on vacation, and details the security requirements and locations for the briefings in Miramar, FL and New York, NY.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI Victim Services Division briefings; the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to attend.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing - Miami
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing - New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized formal briefings for identified victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
The briefings were scheduled for October 15, 2019, in Miramar, FL, and October 23, 2019, in New York, NY.
An attorney requested to attend the New York briefing in place of a client victim who would be on vacation, indicating the FBI was coordinating directly with victims' legal representatives.

The email outlines strict security protocols for attendees, including providing full name, firm, contact info, Social Security Number, and address, due to the briefings being held in federal buildings.
The communication confirms the FBI's ongoing victim outreach and support efforts related to the Epstein case in late 2019.
